Params: {2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant asked me to make this small signal booster, which may enhance our communications. You don't need to worry about it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Changyu's M.I.N.D. is stable. No deviation detected.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But it still needs to be repaired as soon as possible.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Thank you very much. With these resources, we should be able to start repairs immediately.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I can help too. My frame is already connected to the system, so I can send you the real-time readings directly.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You're welcome... Helping each other is what we should do.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'There are still many Corrupted nearby. I suggest we fall back to the carriage behind once we finish.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We'll also need to perform some self-maintenance...", 4: '2'}
